About Me

Hello!

I was born and raised in Chapel Hill, NC, and grew up playing all kinds of games.

I find that I'm naturally curious in how games work, and am constantly thinking about the behind-the-scenes aspects.

I graduated from Wake Tech with an AAS in Simulation & Game Development in 2025.

While attending, I learned about many different aspects and disiplines involved in the industry, and gained lots of experience working with others on various projects.
